name: Woodside Investments
overview:
Woodside Investments Corporation (“WIC”) was founded in 2000 for the sole purposes of finding and creating new investment opportunities in an ever changing global real estate market.

WIC has worked on multiple projects throughout Europe and across North America and our current project type focus is two fold.

Projects that require quick repositioning through better financial controls (such as debt and revenue growth) and Accretive Value Enhancement through land development and rezoning.

WIC’s strength is the ability to understand and maximize the investment’s potential. Through a proven track record we have attracted many sources of private and institutional capital.

funding_round.source_description: Bitmicro Networks, solid state disk storage co., raises $9.3M
